author: PRWEB
title: NEXT Announces Top Producers’ Trip to Puerto Rico
text:
As a Representative-owned firm, we always enjoy giving back to our advisors, who truly are the reason for NEXT’s existence. Houston, TX
NEXT Financial Group Inc. (NEXT) recently announced the qualifiers for its annual Top Producers’ Educational Conference (TPEC), which will be held in San Juan, Puerto Rico this year from September 16-20, 2015.
“As a Representative-owned firm, we always enjoy giving back to our advisors, who truly are the reason for NEXT’s existence,” said Norm Grant, chairman and CEO of NEXT Financial Holdings, Inc. “The NEXT TPEC is one of our most exciting events due in part to the wonderful location, but also because it gives us a chance to spend quality time with some of our firm’s most influential and engaged advisors.”
Every year, NEXT recognizes its top individual producers and top divisions, as well as the top individual producers with its affiliate companies, Visionary Asset Management and NEXT Financial Insurance Services Company, by taking them on an all-inclusive trip to a vacation destination. Past years have included trips to the U.S. Virgin Islands, San Francisco and Alaska.
“It is always easy to have a great time when you are surrounded by friends and family, which explains why it is nearly impossible to leave the NEXT TPEC not feeling refreshed,” said Barry Knight, president of NEXT. “We are all looking forward to this always-unforgettable trip that gives us the chance to create more lasting memories with our NEXT family.”
NEXT Financial Group, Inc. is a Division III broker-dealer servicing approximately 750 independent financial representatives throughout the country. The firm was voted Broker-Dealer of the Year* by its representatives an unprecedented eight times and continues building upon their unique culture to better serve the needs of independent financial professionals and their customers.
*Based on a poll of registered representatives conducted by Investment Advisor magazine. Broker- dealers rated highest by their representatives are awarded “Broker-Dealer (B-D) of the Year.” Securities and investment advisory services offered through NEXT Financial Group Inc. Member FINRA/SIPC.
NEXT Financial Group Inc. is located at 2500 Wilcrest Dr. Ste. 620, Houston, TX 77042. P: 877-876-6398.
